name: Flappy Fario
description:
Fario is the most welcomed plumber, because he invented the most efficient way to fix the pipes by just jump on them!
Now you can let fario jump as far as you can to beat other plumbers.

Gameplay tips:
Just Tap!
longer tap can jumper higher while a short tap may make a small jump.
You may also jump over several pipes sometimes.

Also, you may have a beer to cheer your Fario up!
